org.yawlfoundation.yawl.util

Class JDOMUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.yawlfoundation.yawl.util.JDOMUtil

  • public class JDOMUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Some static utility methods for converting JDOM Documents and Elements to Strings and files & vice versa.
    Author:
    Michael Adams 04/07/2006 Last date: 22/06/08
